Plot: A young Palestinian freedom fighter agrees to work as an informant after he's tricked into an admission of guilt by association in the wake of an Israeli soldier's killing.
Title: Omar
Actors: Adam Bakri, Leem Lubany, Waleed Zuaiter, Samer Bisharat
tomatoConsensus: Twisty and riveting, Omar is a well-directed crime drama with uncommon depth.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 10 nominations.
